name: MindsetReset
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable this Flash Briefing and receive a daily Mindset Shift that helps you face your day with more confidence, grace and power. Start your day with the mindset shift you need to attract success to you. Once the skill is enabled, add the Mindset Reset Flash briefing skill to your morning routine. Select the time you want Lisa to work with you to transform your mindset and start getting better results.

This skill is designed to help you create your ideal life by reprogramming your subconscious mind. It’s all about identifying your blind spots and self-sabotage—and busting through them! You will learn how to tap into your inner wisdom to fulfill your purpose and make a difference for others. Bestselling author Lisa Jimenez will help you create the mindset of a winner—so that you can achieve greater levels of success and have a greater impact on the world.

For more than 30 years, Lisa has been helping people like you transform their mindset and create more fulfilling lives. And now it’s your turn.

Just say Alexa, enable Mindset Reset Flash briefing to get started.

Want more interaction with Lisa J?

Enable the Lisa J skill and ask Alexa for some these unique benefits:

- Play the Build Your Belief Podcast
- Subscribe to the Build Your Belief Podcast
- Immediate mindset shifts to transform your thinking
- Opt in for Email Alerts from Lisa J
- Attend one of Lisa J’s Mindset Reset 2-Day Intensive
- Attend Lisa J’s Paris Mastermind Retreat
- Join Lisa J’s Mindset Reset Coaching Program
- Order a copy of one of Lisa's books.
- Order other resources from Lisa J's online store.

Learn more about the Lisa J Amazon Alexa skill at:
https://LisaJ.com/alexa

Skill developed by Doug Devitre International, Inc.
https://alexa.dougdevitre.com/apply
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
